Name: The Obscura Experiment
About the game: An experiment has gone wrong, and the whole complex is failing. Your only chance at survival is to use the various tools at your disposal to escape this now-hostile environment. But beware: an unrelenting force lurks in the shadows… Play as Priya Ellis, a scientist whose research team has been decimated by a mysterious new form of life - the Dark Matter - which is invisible to the naked eye . Thanks to your scanner tablet and the ships' built-in surveillance system , you can outsmart the roaming menace by carefully planning your next move . But, keep an eye on your scanner’s energy : an empty battery would only guarantee your demise! Locking the doors behind you and luring the Dark Matter to energy sources comes at a high risk, but it could buy you some time… Explore a Hi-Tech environment! Climb aboard the spaceship, and discover a state-of-the-art facility! Challenge the unknown, fight the darkness! Come face-to-face with an unseen menace; push back the obscurity with your wits! Observe, Plan & Execute! Familiarize yourself with your surroundings, develop a strategy, and put your plan into action! Investigate the events & uncover the truth! Figure out what happened onboard, and discover the true motivations of Anabasis & Co.!
